attributes.action: either end the free prescriptions to the Scots, paid for by the English, OR allow the English free prescriptions to exactly the same levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am absolutely appalled the Scots are getting free prescriptions yet the English have to pay, and they keep going up in price.  Not only that, but to add insult to injury, the English are paying for the Scots to have this luxury! It should be one rule for all.  If the Scots want to be ruled by a different government then they should pay for their own entitlements, and not make the English do it.  

I petition not just the Prime Minister, but EVERY MP who believes in fairness and justice!   (For all!) Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
